issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Yazdgerd III on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with three mural elements, crown cap, wing to the right and left; at the top crescent and covered korymbos; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders; pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; three pending elements; crescent on left shoulder, both shoulders decorated with crescent and star; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast, breast decorated with three ellipsoid objects with dot above each element; star in upper left and right field; crescent and star at 4 h, 6  h and 9 h; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 2 h l. i. yzdklty, 11 h l. o. GDH/’pzwt’| Yazdgerd  xwarrah abzūd| “Yazdgerd, he increased the glory”
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of three elements, altar shaft, to the left and the right of the shaft ribbons hanging downwards; four altar slabs; altar flames rendered as four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; star to left of altar flames, crescent to the right; to the left and the right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Yazdgerd III, holding sword with both hands, right hand above left hand, both figures frontal; regnal year at 9 h; ; crescent at 3 h, 6 h 9 h and 12 h; dotted border
